BRK.B &#160; New York Stock Exchange 0.750% Senior Notes due 2023 &#160; BRK23 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 1.125% Senior Notes due 2027 &#160; BRK27 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 1.625% Senior Notes due 2035 &#160; BRK23A &#160; New York Stock Exchange 0.000% Senior Notes due 2025 &#160; BRK25 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 2.375% Senior Notes due 2039 &#160; BRK39 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 0.500% Senior Notes due 2041 &#160; BRK41 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 2.625% Senior Notes due 2059 &#160; BRK59 &#160; New York Stock Exchange Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; ITEM&#160;3.01 Notice of Delisting or Failure to Satisfy a Continue Listing Rule or Standard; Transfer of Listing As described under Item&#160;5.02, on February&#160;14, 2022, Thomas&#160;S. Murphy resigned from Berkshire Hathaway&#8217;s Board of Directors. Prior to Mr.&#160;Murphy&#8217;s resignation, the Board of Directors was comprised of eight independent directors and seven non-independent directors. Mr.&#160;Murphy was an independent director and as a result of Mr. Murphy&#8217;s resignation, the Board of Directors is not currently comprised of a majority of independent directors as required by Section&#160;303A.01 of the NYSE Listed Company Manual. On February&#160;15, 2022, as required by Section&#160;303A.12 of the NYSE Listed Company Manual, Berkshire Hathaway submitted an interim written affirmation to the NYSE as a notice of noncompliance with Section 303A.01 of the NYSE Listed Company Manual. On February&#160;16, 2022, the Company received an official notice of noncompliance from the NYSE. The NYSE notice stated that the Company will need to correct the noncompliance as promptly as practicable. It is the intention of the Berkshire Hathaway Board of Directors to appoint a new independent director as soon as practicable. &#160; ITEM&#160;5.02 Departure of Directors or Certain Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment of Certain Officers; Compensatory Arrangements of Certain Officers On February&#160;14, 2022, Thomas S. Murphy resigned from Berkshire Hathaway&#8217;s Board of Directors. Berkshire Hathaway issued a press release announcing Mr.&#160;Murphy&#8217;s resignation from Berkshire&#8217;s Board of Directors. A copy of the press release is attached as Exhibit 99.1. &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits &#160; 99.1 &#160;&#160; Press Release issued by Berkshire Hathaway Inc. dated February&#160;14, 2022 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document).
